transcript.title: TRANSCRIPT OF THE PRIME MINISTER THE HON JOHN HOWARD MP DOORSTOP INTERVIEW (FOR TVs ONLY) PARLIAMENT HOUSE, CANBERRA
transcript.content:
E&OE....................................................................................................

This is a great day for the Australian economy and for the Australian

people. And we're introducing into Parliament an historic reform

of our taxation system that will build an even stronger Australia

in the next century. We've had dramatic evidence of just how

strongly the Australian economy has grown despite the Asian downturn.

We have defied that downturn. And we have another cut in interest

rates, which is good news for homebuyers. It adds up to the strongest

and best run economy Australia has seen for 30 years. It's

good news all round and it's certainly a defiant repudiation

of the doomsday talk from our political opponents.
